creator: hdt@hans-dieter-thiel.de
text:
I installed Tomcat on Windows as Service with native.dll.
I tried to configure https and get an error log
with a message telling me that there's no keystore file specified!
The same without native.dll all is functioning properly.

This is entirely expected. Please use the users list for help configuring the
native connector correctly.
creator: markt@apache.org
